channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lo-Fi Weather Channel Videos Are Soothing Climate Fears on YouTube
item.description: Hours-long videos of ’80s and ’90s Weather Channel broadcasts set to vaporwave tunes are all over YouTube. They’re perfect for those moments you want ...

item.title: How Google and Yahoo’s shift to stricter email standards proved a windfall for this Armenian startup
item.description: EasyDMARC, a B2B SaaS startup out of Armenia that aims to simplify email security and authentication, said it has raised $20 million in a Series A rou...

item.title: Brompton Electric G Line Review: Stupid Amounts of Fun
item.description: Thrills and spills from a fold-up bike? We couldn’t believe it either.

item.title: MacPaw launches its alternative iOS app store for EU in open beta
item.description: Ukraine-based Mac and iOS app developer MacPaw announced today that it is releasing its alternative mobile app store Setapp thanks to the new Digital ...

item.title: Burning Man Is Over, but Regional Burns Keep the Party Going Year-Round
item.description: If you’re not ready to say goodbye to Burning Man’s vibes—or if you’re looking for “Burning Man Light”—you can attend one of many regional burns aroun...

item.title: Quick-commerce startup Flink raises another $150M at a valuation of nearly $1B
item.description: Flink, a quick-commerce startup out of Berlin that was an acquisition target of Gorillas, Getir, Amazon, and Gopuff, is spelling out how it plans to g...

item.title: The Trumps Have Gone Full Crypto With World Liberty Financial
item.description: After coming out in favor of crypto, the Trump family is launching a venture of its own. You'll just have to wait for the details.

item.title: Amazon will host its Prime Big Deals Day sales event on October 8 and 9
item.description: Amazon said today that it will host its Prime Day-like sales event, “Prime Big Deals Day,” on October 8-9. For the last two years, the ecommerce compa...

item.title: ‘I Told Him I’m Not Getting in It’: Former Titan Submersible Engineer Testifies
item.description: The US Coast Guard’s OceanGate hearings started Monday with some startling revelations—including the last messages from the passengers.

item.title: Bluesky now has more than 10M users
item.description: Social network Bluesky said Monday that it now has more than 10 million users. This is largely thanks to the rapid growth of the network in the past f...
